column1: #  Not available on the ISO website, search for the question
#  ""Where can I find the ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code"" on"
#   - tz = time zone of country as deviation from GMT
#   - st = summer time usage (0 for no, 1 for yes)
#   - fl = status of timezone data (1 for official, 2 for estimate)
#     Added countries outside EU and/or Europe.
#       Adapted to be read in emiproc

column2: The Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia
